greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n>=2} 1/n^(n+1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i; a:=0; for i from 1 by 1 to n do a:=a+i^(-i-1); print(evalf(a-1,101)); od; end: P(100);
mathematica: digits = 100; NSum[1/(n^(n+1)), {n, 2, Infinity}, NSumTerms -> 100, WorkingPrecision -> digits+5] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 18 2014 *)
results.author: _Paolo P. Lava_ and _Giorgio Balzarotti_, Feb 27 2008
ext: Lower summation index in definition corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 26 2009
